ActivityMetadata.Name: GH List repositories starred by a user
ActivityMetadata.Label: GH List repositories starred by a user
ActivityMetadata.Description:
Lists repositories a user has starred.
You can also find out _when_ stars were created by passing the following custom [media type](https://developer.github.com/v3/media/) via the `Accept` header:
ActivityMetadata.HelpHtml:
# Github

List repositories starred by a user

Lists repositories a user has starred. You can also find out _when_ stars were created by passing the following custom [media type](https://developer.github.com/v3/media/) via the `Accept` header:

Method: Get

OperationID: activity/list-repos-starred-by-user

EndPoint:

/users/{username}/starred
